Vastayan Grace.name: Vastayan Grace
Vastayan Grace.description: Innate: Whenever Ahri lands 2 ability hits against a champion within 1.5 seconds, she gains  20% bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

Orb of Deception.name: Orb of Deception
Orb of Deception.blurb: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
Orb of Deception.description: Passive: Ability hits grant an Essence Theft stack, up to a maximum of 3 per cast. At a maximum of 9 stacks, the next Orb of Deception consumes them all to  heal Ahri for  3 / 5 / 9 / 18 (based on level) (+ 9% AP) every time an enemy is hit. Essence Theft is not stacked within the same instance.
Orb of Deception.description2: Active: Ahri sends an orb of arcane energy in the target direction, dealing  magic damage to all enemies it passes through. At maximum range, it homes back to Ahri, dealing  true damage instead.
Orb of Deception.leveling2: Damage Per Pass:40 / 65 / 90 / 115 / 140 (+ 35% AP)Total Mixed Damage:80 / 130 / 180 / 230 / 280 (+ 70% AP)
Orb of Deception.notes:
* Orb of Deception functions normally during flight regardless of Ahri's condition.
 Each pass of the projectile can only damage an enemy once.
 If Ahri is performing an attack animation when the orb switches direction, the attack animation is canceled.
  Flash can be cast during the cast time of the ability.

Fox-Fire.name: Fox-Fire
Fox-Fire.blurb: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
Fox-Fire.description: Active: Ahri summons three spectral flames which orbit her for up to 5 seconds.
Fox-Fire.description2: Flames prioritize champions hit by  Charm, then the target of Ahri's last basic attack within 3 seconds.
Fox-Fire.description3: After 0.25 seconds, each flame targets a visible prioritized enemy; or after 0.4 seconds targets the closest visible enemy in range, prioritizing champions, dealing magic damage.
Fox-Fire.description4: Subsequent flames on a target deal 30% damage.
Fox-Fire.leveling4: Additional Magic Damage:12 / 19.5 / 27 / 34.5 / 42 (+ 9% AP)Total Single Target Damage:64 / 104 / 144 / 184 / 224 (+ 48% AP)
Fox-Fire.notes:
* Each missile of Fox-Fire has its own shorter non-priority range.
 Once locked-on, the missiles will pursue even if Ahri loses sight.
 If the target of Fox-Fire dies, the missile will fizzle.
 Any unused Fox-Fires will fizzle upon death.
 If Ahri uses  Zhonya's Hourglass while Fox-Fire is active, any orbs that have not acquired a target will fizzle.
 The cooldown of Fox-Fire begin once all the orbs have acquired a target or timed-out.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.blurb: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
Charm.description: Active: Ahri blows a kiss in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, interrupting in-progress dashes,  charming and  slowing them by 65%.
Charm.description2: An enemy hit by Charm is vulnerable for 3 seconds, taking 20% bonus damage from Ahri's abilities.
Charm.notes:
* The damage amplification also affects the true damage portion of  Orb of Deception.
 If the charmed enemy does not have sight of Ahri they will stand still for its duration.
 The effect ends if Ahri dies.
  Flash can be cast during the cast animation of Charm.

Spirit Rush.name: Spirit Rush
Spirit Rush.blurb: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
Spirit Rush.description: Active: Ahri  dashes in the target direction and then fires energy bolts to up to 3  visible targets, dealing magic damage. Spirit Rush can be recast twice more at a 1 second static cooldown within 10 seconds of activation at no additional cost.
Spirit Rush.description2: Recast: Ahri  dashes, mimicking the first cast's effects.
Spirit Rush.leveling2: Maximum single target damage:180 / 270 / 360 (+ 105% AP)Maximum damage:540 / 810 / 1080 (+ 315% AP)
Spirit Rush.notes:
* Each dash counts as another ability instance for the purposes of effects such as Spellblade and  Force Pulse.
 Spirit Rush uses quick cast by default.
 There's a slight delay before a champion gains vision of the fog of war once inside it. Because of this, if Ahri dashes into it, it is possible that Spirit Rush will not target any enemy in range.
 If Ahri dies mid-dash, she will not fire the bolts.
